rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: Best professor there is! Must take her class!
She is a great professor. Knows her stuff. Makes the information easy to understand, but studying is a good idea. I also recommend this course as a Maymester course.
Very good teacher.  Class was easy for the most part.  Tests not hard...just have to know your stuff.

rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: Such a nice guy! Class material is pretty boring but he inserts little jokes in every once and a while to keep you awake. He's a smart guy and very willing to help you with anything you need.
